FAQs

Who was Jim Henson?

Jim Henson was an American puppeteer, screenwriter, voice acting, film director, inventor, tv producer, film producer, animator, born on 24 September, 1936 in Greenville, Mississippi, United States.

When did Jim Henson pass away?

Jim Henson passed away on May 16, 1990.

What was the cause of death?

The cause of Jim Hensonâs death was Pneumonia.

How old was Jim Henson at the time of death?

Jim Henson was 34 years old when he passed away.

How tall was Jim Henson?

Jim Henson was 6 feet 0 inches (1.85 m).
